Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue, just south of the Kobiyo Observatory.
Room.LongDescription: The Kobiyo Observatory is a large building in the Wakarimasu Park dedicated to examining the stars and other celestial bodies in space. The Observatory is an extension of the Iilandi University, located to the south. On the south side of the road is the Iilandi University Visitor's Center and the Recreational Facilities.
